ticketing.ticketingNotes: Children under 12 years of age, half price
ticketing.toBeHad: Tickets to be had of Mr. THomas, at the Riding School, and at the Malt Cross, St. James Street.

featuredAttractionsForShow: Equilibriums on the Slack Wire, by the Child of Promise
The much admired Indian War Dance & Combat, which was performed at Astley's upwards of 100 nights.
A Grand Gingling Match, a contest between twelve men, blindfold, for a silver watch. In case the Clown should not be caught in 10 minutes, he is entitled to the watch.

Tight rope dancing, by Mr. Thomas. Who will jump over whips, hats, handkerchief, two carters, over a body of fire, and will dance with a boy at each foot, and conclude with his wonderful back summerset.
Mr. Thomas, the celebrated Flying Horseman, will go through his wonderful Act of Horsemanship, in which he stands classed the First in the Kingdom.

occasions.occasionAsStated: For the benefit of Mr. Thomas

shows.venue: Riding School, Near the castle, Nottingham

ticketing.ticketingNotes: Children under 12 years of age, half price
ticketing.toBeHad: Tickets to be had of Mr. Thomas, at the riding school, and at the Malt Cross, St. James Streem

performers.role: The Fair Rosalie, (betrothed to Henry of Almaigne)

performers.roleNotes: (Betrayed by a promise of marriage, by Walliric)

featuredAttractions.attraction: In which all the horses will appear
A Grand Procession by Real Horses

performances.title: Walliric the Lion, or, Blood Will Have Blood

featuredAttractions.attraction: In which will be representation of a complete field of battle, horse and foot engaged, --- the horses leap at waterfalls, --- scale ramparts, --- a breach made in the castle, the horses leap through the breach; and still more wonderful, their dying scene, in which the agonies of expiring animals are so wonderfully depicted.

occasions.occasionAsStated: For the benefit of Mr. Thomas

shows.venue: Riding School, near the castle, Nottingham
